# Enabling Desktop Notifications

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/enabling-desktop-notifications/

## Category
14 Business Setup

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
STAFF MEMBERS
Enabling Desktop Notifications
IN THIS ARTICLE
Enabling desktop notifications for Mac
Enabling desktop notifications for Windows
Enabling desktop notifications in Mangomint

You can receive desktop notifications when web chat messages are received, which can be helpful for front desk staff members.

To receive desktop notifications, you will need to enable them in:

Your Mac or Windows settings.

Your Mangomint user profile settings.

Link copied
Enabling desktop notifications for Mac

To enable desktop notifications for Mac, go to System Settings > Notifications.

If you are using a separate monitor, select Allow Notifications when mirroring or sharing the display.

Select the web browser application you use with Mangomint, such as Firefox or Google Chrome.

Update the following notification settings for your web browser application:

Allow notifications: On

Desktop: On

Notification Center: On

Once you’ve enabled desktop notifications in your Mac settings, you will need to enable them in your Mangomint user profile settings.

Link copied
Enabling desktop notifications for Windows

To enable desktop notifications for Windows, go to Settings > System > Notifications.

Enable the Notifications toggle.

Once you’ve enabled desktop notifications in your Windows settings, you will need to enable them in your Mangomint user profile settings.

Link copied
Enabling desktop notifications in Mangomint

To enable desktop notifications in your Mangomint user profile settings, go to User Profile > Notifications using a desktop.

Enable the A website chat message is received notification. Your web browser will prompt you to allow notifications. Select Allow. The Browser notifications are enabled message displays.

To confirm your desktop notifications are working correctly, you can select Send test to receive a test notification.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
